title: "Temp Analysis"
author: "Graceson Mule"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(GracesonMuleFlagWeather)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)


MinTemps <- ggplot(data = Flagstaff_Weather, aes(x=DATE, y = TMIN)) +
  geom_line()

SnowFall <- ggplot(data = Flagstaff_Weather, aes(x=DATE, y = SNOW)) +
  geom_line()

Percipitation <- ggplot(data = Flagstaff_Weather, aes(x=DATE, y = PRCP)) +
  geom_line()

MaxTemps <- ggplot(data = Flagstaff_Weather, aes(x=DATE, y = TMAX)) +
  geom_line()

cowplot::plot_grid(MinTemps, MaxTemps, SnowFall, Percipitation, nrow=2, ncol=2, 
                   labels=c('Min Temps','Max Temps','Snow Fall', 'Percipitation'))

```
